#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

unsigned int F(unsigned int n)
{
	return (((n*(n+1))/2)*(1<<(n-1)))%8388608;
}

unsigned int F2(unsigned int n)
{
	unsigned sum(0);
	for (unsigned int i=1; i<=n; ++i)
		sum+=F(i);
	return sum%8388608;
}

int main(void)
{
	unsigned int t;
	unsigned int n;

	cin >> t;

	while(t--){
		cin >> n;
		if (n<22)
			cout << F2(n) << endl;
		else
			cout << 8388607 << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
